entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -41.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 09:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -41.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -45.5°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
